comments: Make a Client Credentials grant request to obtain an access token.

params.name: client_id
comments: (Optional) The client identifier. The client Id is the Id of the FusionAuth Entity in which you are attempting to authenticate.

params.name: client_secret
comments: (Optional) The client secret used to authenticate this request.

params.name: grant_type
comments: The grant type to be used. This value must be set to client_credentials

params.name: scope
comments: (Optional) This parameter is used to indicate which target entity you are requesting access. To request access to an entity, use the format target-entity:<target-entity-id>:<roles>. Roles are an optional comma separated list.
